paper_abstract: The database NPIDB (Nucleic AcidsProtein Interaction DataBase) contains information derived from structures of DNAprotein and RNAprotein complexes extracted from PDB (1834 complexes in July 2007). It is organized as a collection of files in PDB format and is equipped with a web-interface and a set of tools for extracting biologically meaningful characteristics of complexes. The content of the database is weekly updated.
paper_title: NPIDB: A database of Nucleic Acids-Protein Interactions
